LanguageData.ZP_PlantSoy.label: Soybeans
LanguageData.ZP_PlantSoy.description: Soybeans are a boon on the Rim, as chefs can use them in place of meat. In the field, soybeans are slow to grow, but have a low fertility sensitivity/requirement.
LanguageData.ZP_PlantEdamame.label: Edamame
LanguageData.ZP_PlantEdamame.description: Immature soybeans that-as their defining feature is "immaturity"-can be harvested quickly, but have a low nutritiounal value. Like soybeans, Edamame can grow in rough terrain.
LanguageData.ZP_PrantAzuki.label: 小豆
LanguageData.ZP_PrantAzuki.description: 収穫後は長期保存が可能。東アジアが原産地。砂糖と一緒に煮ることで甘い小豆餡をつくれる。
LanguageData.ZP_Glowstool.label: glowstool
LanguageData.ZP_Glowstool.description: A small brown mushroom typically found in caves. It smells like an old, dirty rag pulled from the stomach of a rotting muffalo - but it tastes surprisingly good when cooked. Dies when exposed to light.
LanguageData.ZP_Agarilux.label: agarilux
LanguageData.ZP_Agarilux.description: An enormous purple mushroom. Its size and glowing protrusions make this fungus beautiful to look at. It dies when exposed to light.
